sect2.title: 内容
sect2.para: NTP 包括 NTP 协议客户端和服务器。

sect2.title: 说明
sect2.para: ntpd: NTP daemon that runs in the background 和 keeps the date/time synchronized based on response from configured NTP servers. It also functions as a NTP server.
ntpdate: NTP Client program that sets the date/time based on the response from an NTP Server. This command is deprecated.
ntp-genkeys: This program generates cryptographic data files used by the NTPv4 authentication 和 identification schemes. a ARPANET file transfer client.
ntpdc 和 ntpq: Programs to query 和 set ntpd configuration.
ntptrace: Trace a chain of NTP servers back to the primary source.
